text: @piersmorgan Horby is the Nuffield Department of Medicine Professor of epidemiology, weeks ago, his department announced an agreement with the UK-based global biopharmaceutical company AstraZeneca for the large-scale manufacture and potential distribution of the COVID-19 vaccine Oxford Uni !
